title: Best of The Program | Guests: Steven Crowder & Brian Lilley | 5/20/21
description:
BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder joins to explain why he’s suing YouTube, as the company looks to cancel him indefinitely. Glenn looks into who’s really oppressing the Palestinians — and it’s not the Jews. The Toronto Sun’s Brian Lilley gives an update on Canada’s vaccine rollout, as yet another pastor is arrested for breaking COVID-19 rules.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
